item.title: Why Your Organization Needs a Service Mesh: The Benefits of Service Mesh Architecture and Istio
item.description: Background A lot has changed about how we built microservices, and most people have no choice but to deploy microservices as pods in Kubernetes. Let us take an example where we are running a web application that queries data for the products. If both of these functionalities were on the webserver, then a calculation could slow the response time of the web pages. Having it on a seperate server avoids this problem.
